Идея игры, как и сама игра - хорошая! Группа людей объединяются и пытаются спастись из лап маньяка. Очень весело, когда соберешь друзей в кооператив и в четвером попробуешь свои силы и сових товарищей на прочность! =)
Правда система баланса мне не совсем понятна: когда ты только начинаешь играть и мало что понимаешь, тебя забрасывает в игру против не погодам разьевшегося маньяка, с четырьмя ультраредкими скилами и от его не то что убежать, но и не спрятаться вовсе!
Такая же ситуация, когда пытаешься сыграть за маньяка! Черт побери! у этих выживших куча предметов и способностей, а я пытаюсь позвонить в колокольчик, что бы поймать самого отстающего от всей группы, и, когда ты его (о чудо!) поднимаешь забитого и окрававленного на плечо, из кустов выбигаеют, как гопники, остальные с фонариками наперевес, и ты ближаёшую минуту видишь от них лишь белый экран, а когда, наконец, проморгался, они уже запустили все генераторы и разбежались по-домам!
Сделайте так, что бы нубов кидало к нубам! Дайте нам тоже играть! =)))))

Вообщем хорошая и веселая игра, особенно, если есть кого пригласить в кооп и побегать от маньяка! =) 10\10!

SUPER FUN

First of all, been playing this game for a loooong time. So I though it is time to re-do my review.

This game is an interesting concept, having the “horror film cliches” into one playfield and see what happens. 4 humans with different perks against a single but “OP” killer, rushing for survival, or killing them all (not talking about the killer).

As one reviewer said, this game suffers from the same problem as many multiplayer titles, a toxic community. But the approach of cutting communication in-game is sometimes a marvelous thing (no whining or insults while playing).  I come from a good group of players in L4D, but to get there had to play with an incredible amount of assholes for a long time. Even a good group has its up and downs (like any good family). To play this, you have to shut down your “Cooperative gameplay” chip down.

If you're survivor, you can play as a helpful companion, but as stated before, this is no regular coop, this is a horror movie! How many times the cool dude got wack because tried to play hero? Or the asshole used somebody injured to lure the bad guy away? Or it is new for you that a screaming victim may be a trap set by a sadistic killer to get 2 for the price of 1??? well, this is life baby, this is DEAD BY DAYLIGHT.

Once you get that into your head (I had to, believe me). The game is quite enjoyable (for both killers and survivors). Of course escaping as a group is rewarding, but so is killing everyone XD.

The game has been tweaked a lot since I bought it. That is sometimes good (like the new ping meter in lobby), but also introduces bugs, like the lost of all progress! Its quite bad. There is a post of how to backup your local save but most people (including me) read it AFTER you lost all :( does not happens often, but is a real risk.

With the ping indicator, is now easier to participate in a good game, most of the bugs come from sync problems between you and the game's host (no server model, unfortunately) so if you only stay in lobbies with a good connection, there is a great chance you will be fighting for survival, not framerates XD

I think this game worth buying only on sale. There is still issues to look but its different, and I like it for that. Hope this helps, see ya in the fog!

games really fucking buggy at some points, such as killers hitting you after you've jumped through a window or obstacle despite being out of range, but its really fun and im definitely gonna buy it next week! deffo reccomend it as those bugs will probably be patched soon!

Im going to start with my rating out of 10 
I personally would rate this game as a 8/10 
This is becuase its absolutely awesome to play, it has a great fear factor and feels like a  horror game as you dont know what is going to happen and its amazing if you can get a team of 4 (your friends) and then go and survive together while on skype or teamspeak etc. 

But the reason its not a 9 or 10 is that there is quite a lot of issues and quirks with the gameplay that i dont like too much:
1. Killers have become too op in last patch - they have a lrger attack range so they can kill after you have stunned or jumped over a pallet and you will get hurt, posiibly on the floor if you have been chaes and previously injured. 
2. Matchmaking is f*cking horrible, if you search on your own, it mostly comes up saying "failed to join game", or I will be sent back to the main menu, but it is still possible to get into a match but takes like 5 mins 

Those are the two main issues but still it is a very enjoyable game and I have spent these 14 hours having lots of fun with friends surviving or killing people as a murderer (Yes I have only got 14 hourse but still wanted to give a honest review probably will make a new one once played a LOT more and added new content.) 

Plz be nice this is my first review :)

This, was, so, FUN! Me and my friends usually played Damned, which for those who don't know - Is sort of a more simplistic version of this. The concept is incredibly fun, and I don't remember a game that's made me scream and panic as much as this one did. While I did encounter some weird glitches, and annoying wait times, the gameplay itself was extremely entertaining. Despite others mentioning a toxic community, most of the people I interacted with were friendly and made the rounds really fun (Especially some of the more creative monster players). I suggest playing with friends to avoid the que, but otherwise I'd reccomend this for sure!

Killer can swing and as long as you're in meter radius, even if you're behind them 180 degrees, they've added a system to where you'll automatically get hit.  The killer is faster than you, can hit you as long as your're close, the only thing that survivors had to get away were a couple infinites, which have been removed, or "Fixed."  Now, when you jump out of a window, if you dont have a certain perk youll be stunned for a second.  THe killed got a new lunge, which allows him to charge forwards and hit you if you're close enough, even though he can already run faster than you.  This game is atrocious, and no matter how much the community complains that killers are OP, you will always have those who defend, and the devs are only making the survivors worse with each update.  For example, they just released a new killer called the Nurse.  She can teleport, or blink forward.  Doesnt matter if you throw down a pallet or anything, she can avoid those.  When she hits you, she has an ability to see where you're at in a certain radius.  So lets say you're playing, and she swings and hits you, you will never be able to get away from her unless she is fucking stupid.  She will follow you until she kills you because she will know where you're at.  Thats absolute garbage.  Survivors cant survive anymore if the killer is good.  THe game is horrible unbalanced.

Played for several hours during the free weekend. Played mostly Killer and one game as Survivor. Had a few issues with disconnecting players and fairly long lobby times but overall really enjoyed the game and glad I got to try it.

Overall, I enjoyed this game. 

However - there are a lot of issues that people who are less patient than me would rage over (and I can understand why). Matchmaking is....difficult to say the least. And that's just when you're by yourself. If you try to play with a friend they may or may not be able to join your game and then when they do you're right back to the start of trying to join a public match which, like I said earlier, is difficult. There are some lag issues as well as some issues in the game where i would press a button for a control and it just wouldn't work (which is not fun when you're stuck in a bear trap or trying to vault through a window). 

If I had the extra money to spare I would definitely buy the game though. It's fun and it's not a ton of money. I do wish that the developers would work a bit harder to fix all these issues because from what I understand these are not new and should have been dealt with prior to game release.

Das Spiel ist sehr simpel, doch es macht viel spaß es mit Freunden zu spielen. Das Spiel hat jedoch viele nachteile, das Lobby-Such system wurde gefixt, dennoch sind sehr viele andere Bugs im Spiel. W.z.b ist es viele male passiert das ich in manchen Maps an einer Wand oder einem Stein hängen geblieben bin. Sehr viele male ist es auch passiert das wenn man an einen Harken gehangen wird, der Spieler am Harken "herum fliegt". Sprich seine Animation verschiebt sich. Dies ist jedoch nicht so schlimm. Manchmal habe ich als Killer eine art hacking bug entdeckt. Wenn ein Opfer zwischen einen Generator und dem Killer läuft, kann der Killer die Harre von dem Opfer sehen wie diese den Generator teils verdecken. Somit wissen manche Killer auch wo man selbst ist. Gerade ist mir etwas ungewöhnliches passiert, ich war mit meinem Freund als überlebender am Spielen, da treten irgendwie 3 weitere Überlebende dem Spiel bei. Sie haben sich nicht bewegt, ich denke das es ein Verbindungs fehler war oder sowas. Das Spiel ist sehr unfair im moment, die Maps sind teils zu klein weil meistens der killer einfach vorbei kommt und dich down bekommt. Das Spiel ist im moment sehr unfair, es ist nicht sehr "ballanced".

Meine Bewertung ist jedoch negativ aus einem gutem Grund. Das Spiel ist keine 20 Euro wert, es ist für den jetzigen stand des Spieles viel zu viel. Das neueste Update mit der Krankenschwester war kostenlos. Die Entwickler haben vor kostenpflichtige DLC's zu veröffentlichen. 20 Euro für ein verbugtes Spiel wo die Entwickler auch noch mehr für haben wollen. Eine Nachricht an die Entwickler: You are not EA if you think not fixing bugs rather than creating more buggy content that costs money is okay, then you are wrong! Listen to your Community or you will loose it! 
Ganz klare kaufempfehlung, aber im moment ist das Spiel das Geld nicht wert. Ihr solltet es euch reduziert kaufen.

Its been over 2 years since this games first release... Tons of DLC being brought out, Tons of new content, and tons of reworked content.

To be quite quick in this review, yes, this game is incredibly fun, in fact, I play it all the time. I don't see any reason to not have this. If you're wondering about the mixed reviews this game has now, there was recently a patch that brought more power to the killer's side, and took a lot of it away from the survivor. Being able to use really powerful perks twice in a row during a chase is not fun, which is what the patch fixes.

Also a very famous youtuber/streamer OchiDO got hardware banned because of his incredibly high amounts of toxicity and use of exploits. A good move on the Devs parts, we were all pretty much waiting for it.

Again, this game is not abandoned. It's stil very much alive. Although theres some toxicity in it, I still very rarely see it. Reddit is hilarious with the memes and the devs do try hard in order to make the game a fun and welcoming environment.
The game felt like i was playing inside a 80s horror movie... going to buy today!

I did not think it was possible but the devs really did it with this update. They fixed tons of bugs, fixed the matchmaking, and I love it. Would 10/10 play this again.

Хм, честно говоря, я ожидал куда  более хреновый результат, но игра смогла меня немного удивить.
Начнем пожалуй с того, что сама идея игры, ( не скажу, что прям очень ), но оригинальна. Если совсем кратко, не вдаваясь в подробности - есть 4 замызганных, перепуганных человечка и один брутально-сумашедший мясничок ( которого есть аж 4 разновидности ). Задача маньяка - в идеале поймать и засадить на крючок ( да именно, большой железный крюк ) хотя бы одного студентика. В свою очередь, задача простых людишек - сбежать из этого шизанутого места ( желательно не ногами вперед). Есть два способа сбежать - активировать 4 генератора, таким образом подав питание к двум воротам ( которые, кстати тоже придется открывать, тратя драгоценное время)или же дождаться/оказаться в ситуации, когда все твои 3 товарища отправились в небытие. Тогда на карте открывается люк ( который, кстати, генерируется рандомно), с помощью которого вы можете попрощаться с дяюшкой палачом. Несмотря на то, что мужичок с тесаком имеет довольно много преимуществ, работая в команде ( Хотя бы попытайтесь, серьезно. Помогая товарищам, вы не только увеличиваете шансы на победу всей команды, но и получаете много очков. Отсидеться в будке толчка всегда успеете ) и включив собственную голову, обхитрить и победить становится вполне реально.
Геймплей довольно интересный, хотя и порой до противности простой и шаблонный. Для полной остроты ощущений, советую играть раунд за жертву, а потом за маньячка. Скорее всего, после 20-го раза ваше сердце не будет биться в унисон с таковым персонажа, но чувство стелса имеет месть быть ( хоть и весьма примитивного ). Да, игра сейчас малость сыровата, туда можно бы добавить чего-нибудь более крипового ( фразочки маньяка и т.д) и реалистичного. Однако, я надеюсь, что этот продукт постепенно будут улучшать и обновлять, так что поживем-увидим.
Покупать игру, отбирая последние деньги у мамки из кошелька не советую, но и кидать говном в эту игру ( пока что ) тоже не буду.
P.S Но должен признать - это довольно приятно засадить на крюк чувака, который мансовал и доставал тебя на протяжении 20 минут :3

Don't buy this game. It is at best still in mid-beta and has an enormous and embarassing amount of glitches throughout gameplay. Thanks to the most recent patch, killers are almost comically overpowered. They now have:
-autoaim to the point that they can hit you when their back is facing you
-hit boxes that allow them to hit you multiple steps away from the other side of a window or pallet
-the ability to hit through walls
it was a little buggy but supper fun

I wanted this game on release but after careful thought and watching youtube streams i realized this game is NOT  ready release game. It's an early release/beta disguised as a ready release game, so i didn't get it.
fast forward to august 20th. free weekend. hellyeah.
so i downloaded it and spend the past 15 hours playing it straight and have come to the conclusion that this is actually worth the price tag, which even when it's not on sale is like $20.
the premise of the game is simple. you have a team of 4 people who are trying to escape a map before getting killed or sacrificed by a demon killer / monster thing.
the game gives you options on how to try and beat a map. i've seen people forego saving others to start the generators needed to activate the exit doors and then whole teams try to save people who get caught by the monsters.
the monsters themselves are pretty well thought out and with the recent update one of them can shift through walls which means you have to get good at juking and not being so readable. with the original few monsters you could throw things in the way to slow them down. 

The main issue with the game is that the server is based on the person who is playing the monster instead of actual servers. other issues include buggy maps and some necessary balancing tweaks. I have won matches against level 20 and up players when i was level 1 because you have to be unpredicatble as both a human and a monster. another issue is the lobby and waiting area is shit. you might wait anywhere to seconds to upwards of 10 minutes to get into a game and those games range from 5 minutes to 40 minutes.

The developers are constantly working on and updating the game and for $20 give or take that beats out some AAA games. if you have the bill to spend i'd get it. the game can only get better and once you get the hang of your role and how it fits in with your gameplay the game itself becomes quite enjoyable.

7/10 because of tech issues, meh graphics, balance issues that will most likely be addressed with upcoming patches (at which point i'd move it up to an 8/10)

Must say im amazed, this game is awsome, and will surely buy it  :o)

Thx for the Dead by Daylight free weekend, made me change my mind about this game, had a blast  :o)

I really love this game, but there's some issues with matchmaking and some bugs. Also it's really frustrating to be new to this game and getting matched up against the rank 1 SUPERMLG every ultra rare perk under the sun kilers and full parties of survivors. There's just not enough players to match you up with people around your rank/playtime. 
Other than those few complaints I would love to see this game do well and can't wait for the full release.

Completely broken atm.  BHVR kills every other game they've made, so DbD really is the single golden egg this goose has laid, but they somehow keep failing to polish it.  Survivors are currently unstoppable with the new Boon totems, and every DLC they release breaks 1-3 maps despite spending weeks on the test server.  Matchmaking times are much better than they were in previous years, but high tier play is basically impossible for most Killers due to the broken new survivor and her perks.  Will happily take a few months' break again and play Hunt: Showdown until DbD sorts itself out one way or another.

I wasn't sure about this game in the beggining.  It's sort of out of my norm RTS play.  That said, I have become totally addicted to it.  There were problems in the beginning with lobby and small stuff but now that more people are playing, it takes less time to wait for a game.  It's a very well balanced game from the killer and survivor perspective.  I would seriously recommend using headphones to play well as a lot of the queus are audible and need paying attention to in order to be good at this and up your rank.  I also suggest playing a killer and survivor at different times so you can learn more about how to be good at both.  All-in-all, I think it is an ecxellent game with even greater potential for future DLC.
great fun, great direction, new content is good and the devs listen to the community

-Matchmaking falho.
-Jogo em completo desbalanceamento(principalmente com o monstro da DLC).
-Muitos Hackers.
-Sistema de lobby bugando.

Mas apesar disso o jogo é bem divertido, se resolverem os problemas citado acima ficaria um jogo incrivel.

Zajímavý nápad. Hra je zábavná a co jsem si mohl přes víkend vyzkoušet, tak i celkem chytlavá (záleží jestli to vydrží i přes dlouhodobé hraní). Jediný co bych vytknul je lobby, kdy to často hru nenajde nebo když už to vypadá že se člověk dostane do lobby, tak ho to vrátí na úvodní obrazovku. Možnost hrát jak za lovce tak za lovnou zvěř je fajn.

ДБД-это когда ты спас троих с крюка, двоих по два раза, а вместо того что-бы тебя спасти они попробовали завести генераторы и слились.
ДБД-это когда против тебя баганный призрак, пролетающий сквозь доски.
ДБД-это худшие тиммейты в мире(в Доте лучше, имхо)
ДБД-это когда выживший-професионал сильнее маньяка-идиота.
ДБД-это аутизм и ДЦП в чистом виде.
Но при всём этом это очень неплохая игра, но реально обидно что ДЛС на бесплатную версию не ставится, чёрт его дери, а по кармашку бьёт так нехило. Буду ждать зимы, обязательно куплю и накачу вторую версию обзора.
